description.value:
You have practiced preventing an enemy from using a grenade by destroying and detonating it in their hand.

Benefit: As a standard action, you can attempt a sunder attack with a melee or ranged weapon targeting an enemy wielding a grenade. If the sunder attack succeeds and deals damage in excess of the grenade’s hardness, the grenade explodes in the wielder’s space; choose a corner of the holding creature’s square at random to determine the placement of the grenade. The creature holding the grenade takes a –2 penalty to the saving throw against this grenade.

Normal: Combat maneuvers can be attempted against an opponent within your reach (including your weapon’s reach, if applicable).
